title: [Hearthstone, Foyer]
description: Dark flagstone floors extend in a gleaming river of darkness beneath thick, handwoven crimson rugs in this spacious foyer.  To the north, banners of purple, blue, green, and yellow flutter from a balcony railing some fifty feet overhead.  A granite archway sweeps along the length of the western wall, and a magnificent fieldstone staircase curves upward to the east.
